content: {"locationId": "2754", "organizationId": "2279", "name": "UWTC/Pearl Street Cupboard and Cafe", "address1": "46 Park Street", "address2": "", "city": "Framingham", "state": "MA", "zipCode": "01702", "country": null, "phone": "508-370-4922", "phoneExt": "", "website": "UWOTC.org", "latitude": "42.277934", "longitude": "-71.4191315", "foodPrograms": "Meal Program, Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Pearl Street serves thousands of your neighbors each month and we rely on our dedicated volunteers and loyal supporters to serve the community. Since opening our doors in 2012, the Pearl Street Cupboard & Caf\u00e9 at Park has become one of the largest food pantries in Massachusetts, serving thousands of local residents who struggle to make ends meet. The Pearl Street Cupboard & Caf\u00e9 provides monthly groceries to Framingham residents. Individuals and families in need are provided with a monthly supply of nutritious foods like chicken and fish, produce, dairy, bread and grocery items to prepare meals at home. A community meal is served 5 days each week for residents of Framingham and surrounding towns. Volunteers serve up three-course meals in a homestyle setting. Fresh produce, bread and additional meals are available for Caf\u00e9 clients to bring home to increase regular access to nutritious food.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Joseph Mina", "contactPhone": "508-370-4922", "contactEmail": "Joe.Mina@uwotc.org", "servicePrograms": "Employment Services/Workforce Development, Healthcare Screenings/Referrals, Housing Assistance, SNAP Assistance, WIC Outreach", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Home Food Delivery, Indoor Service", "dietRestrictions": "Gluten Free, Low Sodium, Vegan, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Other, Protein, Sit Down Meals", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 26, "regionName": "The Greater Boston Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "fe65478e-80f9-4330-b719-d2afc58262f8.png", "website": "https://www.gbfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 9:00 AM-10:00 AM", "Monday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Monday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Monday 5:30 PM-7:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-10:00 AM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 5:30 PM-7:00 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-10:00 AM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 5:30 PM-7:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-10:00 AM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 5:30 PM-7:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-10:00 AM", "Friday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Friday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Friday 5:30 PM-7:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
